definition: characterized by directness in manner or speech, a smooth-textured sausage of minced beef or pork usually smoked, exempt by means of an official pass or letter, as from customs or other checks
details:
adjective
- characterized by directness in manner or speech
= synonyms: forthright
- clearly manifest
noun
- a smooth-textured sausage of minced beef or pork usually smoked
= synonyms: dog
verb
- exempt by means of an official pass or letter, as from customs or other checks
- stamp with a postmark to indicate date and time of mailing
= synonyms: postmark
